# UIActivityIndicatorView.Style

**Enumeration**

The visual style of the progress indicator.

## Declaration

```swift
enum Style
```

## Overview

You set the value of the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIActivityIndicatorView/style-swift.property] property with these constants.

## Constants

- **UIActivityIndicatorView.Style.large**: The large style of indicator.
- **UIActivityIndicatorView.Style.medium**: The default activity indicator style.
- **UIActivityIndicatorView.Style.whiteLarge**: The large white style of indicator.
- **UIActivityIndicatorView.Style.white**: The standard white style of indicator.
- **UIActivityIndicatorView.Style.gray**: The standard gray style of indicator.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
